subject: Payment deducted but service not working
body: My payment was deducted but the service is still not working. This is frustrating.

subject: Feature request for dark mode
body: I really like the app. Could you add a dark mode option?

subject: Suspicious login activity
body: I noticed login attempts from unknown locations. Please check urgently.

subject: Thank you for quick support
body: Thanks for resolving my issue quickly. Really happy with the service.

subject: App performance is slow
body: The app has been very slow and often freezes over the past few days.
